import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, FormCheckbox } from "shards-react"; import PageTitle from "../components/common/PageTitle"; import AddDaerahForm from "../components/components-overview/AddDaerahForm"; import { GETALLDAERAH } from '../utils/url' import axios from 'axios'; const Daerah = () => { const [data,setData]=useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ axios .get(GETALLDAERAH) .then((res) => { const result = res.data.data; setData(result); alert("Username or Password Wrong"); }) },[]) return( {/* Page Header */} {/* Default Light Table */}
List Daerah
 { data.map((item)=> ) }
# Nama Provinsi Edit Delete
{item.id} {item.nama} Edit Delete
Add Daerah
 ) } export default Daerah;
